BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: BOYS & GIRLS CLUBS OF THE LEWIS CLARK

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE BOYS & GIRLS CLUBS OF THE LEWIS CLARK VALLEY IS: TO ENABLE ALL YOUNG PEOPLE, ESPECIALLY THOSE WHO NEED US MOST, TO REACH THEIR FULL POTENTIAL AS PRODUCTIVE, CARING, RESPONSIBLE CITIZENS
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE BOYS & GIRLS CLUBS OF THE LEWIS CLARK VALLEY IS: TO ENABLE ALL YOUNG PEOPLE, ESPECIALLY THOSE WHO NEED US MOST, TO REACH THEIR FULL POTENTIAL AS PRODUCTIVE, CARING, RESPONSIBLE CITIZENS
IRS990.Desc: BOYS & GIRLS CLUBS OF THE LEWIS CLARK VALLEY BUILDS CHARACTER THROUGH EVERYDAY LEADERSHIP AND GUIDANCE IN BEHAVIOR AND ATTITUDE. YOUNG PEOPLE OF ALL NATIONALITIES, RACES AND CREEDS JOIN TOGETHER IN WHOLESOME RECREATION AND COMPANIONSHIP. TRAINED PROFESSIONAL STAFF PROVIDE POSITIVE ADULT MENTORS AND ROLE MODELS. NATIONALLY RECOGNIZED PROGRAMS HELP YOUNG PEOPLE SUCCEED IN SCHOOL, STAY HEALTHY, LEARN IMPORTANT LIFE SKILLS, PURSUE INTEREST IN ARTS AND SPORTS, AND EXPLORE VOCATIONAL CHOICES. MOST IMPORTANTLY, THE ORGANIZATION SHOWS YOUNGSTERS THAT SOMEONE CARES AND WANTS THEM TO REALIZE THEIR FULL POTENTIAL AS PRODUCTIVE, RESPONSIBLE, AND CARING CITIZENS. DURING THE FISCAL YEAR, THE CLUBS SERVED 3,953 MEMBERS FROM 2,851 HOUSEHOLDS, OF WHICH 43% PARTICIPATE IN FREE & REDUCED LUNCH PROGRAMS, 29% COME FROM HOUSEHOLDS WITH INCOME LESS THAN $30,000 AND 28% COME FROM HOUSEHOLDS WITH A SINGLE PARENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 2: Description of Business or Family Relationship of Officers, Directors, Et
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SAMUEL PENNEY IS AN EMPLOYEE OF THE NEZ PERCE TRIBAL EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. GARY AND MELVA PRASIL ARE SIBLINGS AND DAN IS GARY'S SON.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FROM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WITH THE TREASURER OF THE BOARD AND THE FINANCE COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS ARE COMPLETED BY BOARD MEMBERS AND REVIEWED ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION FOR KEY EMPLOYEES IS REVIEWED ON AN ANNUAL BASIS BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE BOARD CONSIDERS EXTERNAL COMPETITIVENESS, INTERNAL EQUITY, AND RECOGNITION OF DIFFERENCES IN PERFORMANCE IN ORDER TO RECRUIT AND RETAIN QUALIFIED KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WILL BE PROVIDED UPON REQUEST OR MAY BE VIEWED AT THE FINANCIAL OFFICE.
